name: Intro
_source: speak;Trinity; So, tell me... {c:expression;Trinity;Smile} Should I trust you on taking this task of stopping whoever attacked our ships?{w} If you fail, Its you head.
speak;Gabrielle; They shall be arriving soon as we speak,{w}  Our ambush is ready and waiting{w}  There's no way they can escape.
speak;Gabrielle; Like rats in a sack, as they say.{w} Heh heh heh.
speak;Trinity; Very good{w} {c:expression;Trinity;Smile} Won't that wretched Darcy be delighted.
speak;Trinity; (She would be thrilled to get her hands on any intruder that impose a threat to us.){w};;;thought_bubble;no_talk
speak;Trinity; I shall trust in you plans that you can kill the intruders that will be here soon.{w}
speak;Gabrielle;Don't worry.{w} Everything is under control.{w} We made our defenses strong enough to even deal with the strongest monsters.{w}
speak;Trinity;Heh heh heh{w}{tgm}...{w}{tgm} {c:expression;Trinity;NoSmile}Pray it goes as you say.{w} Very well. Do what you must. I must return to the capital.
speak;Gabrielle; Will you not stay and see how they be destroyed?{w}

speak;Trinity;Unlike two other layabouts I know, I do not have such time to waste.{w} I have much to do for our master.{w} A mountain of tasks awaits me.{w} My time is far too precious to waste on the likes of that royal whelp.{w} Trifles such as these are best left in the hands of servants {tgm}{w}...{w}{tgm} such as you.
speak;Gabrielle; Y-yes, of course{tgm}...{tgm} {c:expression;Gabrielle;Smile} Then{tgm}...{br}{tgm} travel well.
speak;Gabrielle; Hmph{tgm}...|{tgm} Freakish young girl.{w} You could learn a thing or two of a tactician of umbra's army.
# popup Redwood port/The port is a neutral area between Wrisiam
is a neutral area between Wrisiam[A]
and Rosefall, All seems well until
Emma and the group docked at[A]
the port and are met with an cold welcome.
We.... finally made it i can finally stop being
seasick from that terrible ship and ocean.[A]
[OpenLeft]You need to do something with that sickness.[A]
[OpenMidRight]What do you want me to do? Magically cast
a spell on my stomach and get better in 10[A]
seconds? Huh sis?[A][OpenLeft]I was joking sis. you can't do anything about
seasickness unless you got a healer that has[A]
that kind of magic. Lily was busy doing
[OpenMidRight]Lucky for me that Nicole helped me.
Otherwise I would needed a bucket for the[A]

drop your weapons and we might spare you.[A]

Our plans are almost finished here.[A]
[OpenFarRight]By just looking at my face you know
Enough talk, EVERYONE!! Lets show them
